attributes.action: We call upon parliament to reject the referendum result
attributes.background: The people we have elected as parliamentary MPs are more informed to make important constitutional decisions regarding the EU than the general public. We call on them to debate and vote on whether ratifying the referendum result would be in the interest of the UK and if not, to reject it.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/148969
